snippet: The Judiciary Committee approved bills to expand background checks to private gun sales and to renew a grant program that focuses on school security.
abstract: Senate Judiciary Committee passes two measures intended to curb gun violence, and bills will likely advance for full Senate vote; postpones vote on more contentious proposal to reinstate assault weapons ban due to absence of sponsor Sen Dianne Feinstein.
lead_paragraph: The Judiciary Committee approved bills to expand background checks to private gun sales and to renew a grant program that focuses on school security.

headline.seo: Senate Panel Approves Two Gun Measures
headline.main: Senate Panel Approves Two Gun Control Bills
headline.print_headline: Senate Panel Approves Two Gun Control Bills
